definition: (bird species of China) common raven (Corvus corax)

sentences.english: A cloak of raven feathers fluttered from his shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 渡鸦羽毛的斗篷在肩头上顺风飘动。

sentences.english: The raven hopped quickly from the branch and seized the nut in his beak.
sentences.chinese: 渡鸦很快从树枝上跳下来，把核桃叼走了。

sentences.english: Huge ravens in the courtyard added to the sad atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 中庭里身形巨大的渡鸦更添悲伤的气氛。

sentences.english: Maester Rhodry stood beside him, a raven on his arm.
sentences.chinese: 手臂上站着一只渡鸦的罗德里学士站在他旁边。

sentences.english: Hmm?Oh, yes, yes of course. My raven is right here.
sentences.chinese: 唔？哦，对，当然。我的渡鸦在这儿呢。

sentences.english: Charal used her power to turn into a raven.
sentences.chinese: 查拉尔曾运用自己的魔力变成一只渡鸦。

sentences.english: She saw the famous Tower ravens.
sentences.chinese: 她看到了那个著名塔上的渡鸦。

sentences.english: I am helium raven and this movie is mine.
sentences.chinese: 我是氦气的渡鸦，这电影是我的。

sentences.english: Like other corvids, ravens cache food for later use.
sentences.chinese: 渡鸦与其他鸦科动物一样，会储存食物，日后享用。

definition: capercaillie (Lagopus, several species)/thunderbird (in native American mythology)
vulture/(bird species of China) cinereous vulture (Aegypius monachus)
